issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: On Android, dark mode images are not picked if they are set via the "Ti.UI.View.backgroundImage" property. It works fine when being set via the "image" property in buttons / image views.
fields.summary: Android: Dark mode images are not picked if set via "Ti.UI.View.backgroundImage"
